# BuggyController.GetServerError method

Throws an exception to simulate a server error (500).

```csharp
public ActionResult GetServerError()
```

## Return Value

An ActionResult representing the server error.

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| Exception | Thrown to simulate a server error. |
